name: iPhone 16 Pro Max
description: Top-tier iPhone with luxury build, class-leading video, and reliable battery life.
camera_info: Four cameras including LiDAR; exceptional video and solid photo performance.

name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: Light titanium design, A17 Pro chip, and top-class photography.
camera_info: Amazing portrait mode and cinematic video recording.

name: iPhone 14 Pro Max
description: Dynamic Island, ProMotion display, and superb battery life.

name: iPhone SE (2022)
description: Affordable iPhone with A15 Bionic and compact design.
camera_info: Excellent performance in a small body.

name: iPad Pro 13 (M4)
description: Ultra-thin OLED screen, M4 chip performance, perfect for professionals.
camera_info: Powerful front camera; optimized for FaceTime and productivity.

name: iPad Air (M2)
description: M2 chip brings more power to this lightweight iPad.
camera_info: Smart HDR camera, great for both video calls and content creation.

name: Galaxy S25 Ultra
description: Premium Android with S Pen, bright display, and strong all-round performance.
camera_info: Versatile system, flagship video and photography.

name: Galaxy S24 Plus
description: Compact powerhouse with long battery and premium design.
camera_info: Excellent low-light photography and stable video.

name: Galaxy Z Fold6
description: Next-gen foldable design with improved durability and pro cameras.
camera_info: Refined imaging and video experience with foldable advantage.

name: Galaxy Z Flip6
description: Pocket-sized foldable with flagship-level cameras and style.
camera_info: Great for selfies and vlogging with Flex mode.

name: Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra
description: Giant AMOLED display, S Pen included, and PC-like performance.
camera_info: Dual front cameras optimized for video calls and multitasking.

name: Galaxy Tab S9 FE
description: Affordable Galaxy Tab with water resistance and S Pen support.
camera_info: Great for casual media consumption and note-taking.
